speaker: Nurse Green
dialog:
The doctor will be with you 
shortly.

speaker: Nurse Green
dialog:
But since there is still a long 
line of people in front of you,

speaker: Nurse Green
dialog:
Let's go ahead and cover some 
basic rules:

speaker: Nurse Green
dialog:
As you probably already know, 
the arrow keys control your movements

speaker: Nurse Green
dialog:
And pressing the spacebar allows 
you to interact with nearby objects or people.

speaker: Nurse Green
dialog:
And that's pretty much all there 
is to it!

speaker: Nurse Green
dialog:
When your number is called, you 
may proceed through the double doors on your 
right.
